name: SAUEREISEN Self-Leveling Expoxy NovolaK 228SL
description: SAUEREISEN Self-Leveling Expoxy NovolaK 228SL is a self-leveling coating system for flooring applications. This product offers excellent application properties and is an ideal chemical-resistant flooring material for areas where traffic is not extreme. Where skid resistance is required, various sized aggregates may be incorporated as a broadcast system.
